title: Fundamentals of Machine Learning for Predicting Chemical Sensor Performance

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of introductory chemistry, statistics, programming (Python), and machine learning algorithms (e.g., linear regression)
context.additional_context: Aims to develop the ability to predict chemical sensor performance through experimental data analysis and modeling, overcoming limited technical environments by combining smartphone-based learning tools and offline workshops

learning_goals: Learners can interpret the correlation between physicochemical properties and electrochemical characteristics of chemical sensor materials
Conduct a practical exercise predicting sensor sensitivity and detection limits using linear regression models
Evaluate the predictive accuracy of machine learning models based on analysis data from real-world environmental samples (coffee/wine)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
